channel.title: Summer School: Hogwarts and Pigsmoke
channel.description:
Double Feature!
On Saturdays of August, go back tot he 90s and early evens, playing students at Hogwarts.
On Sunday, stay on our hellish timeline and play the teachers at the state-of-the-art magical teaching university of Pigsmoke (that somehow cannot afford to give tenure to most of its teaching staff).
Hogwarts: [date=2019-08-03 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTK_cdaJMUX3FuR4hF) [date=2019-08-10 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTL3bKIRPlawfS91Lf) [date=2019-08-17 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTLeE95ofhN3D-Yp6A) [date=2019-08-24 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTLpPkyWlpKDIjAETg)
Pigsmoke: [date=2019-08-04 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTOd_fZVDBvcZjLGnw) [date=2019-08-11 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTOq1cB81-AQDmwYyH) [date=2019-08-18 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTOz8JC8_gfNS-lOXC) [date=2019-08-25 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiTP3FQ6xeeMd3RYvK_)
